cards.title: Charm Person
cards.description: Charm Person: Charm a humanoid with a wisdom saving throw, advantage if in combat. Charmed until spell ends or if harmed, seeing you as a friend. Recognizes charm when spell ends.

cards.title: Hideous Laughter
cards.description: "Tasha's Hideous Laughter" causes a target to perceive everything as funny, potentially falling prone and becoming incapacitated. They can attempt to end the effect with successful Wisdom saving throws.

cards.title: Minor Illusion

cards.title: Vicious Mockery
cards.description: Vicious Mockery: Insult a creature to deal 1d4 psychic damage and give disadvantage on its next attack if it fails a wisdom saving throw. Damage increases with levels.
